text: Gavrilin is a Russian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Andrei Gavrilin (born 1978), Kazakh ice hockey player *Igor Gavrilin (rugby league) (born 1971), Russian rugby league player *Igor Gavrilin (footballer) (born 1972), Russian football player *Valery Gavrilin (1939–1999), Russian composer ==See also== *7369 Gavrilin, an asteroid Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Gavrilin
